messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Gay Robot Rehab XVII, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Scanners have reported unkown biological lifeforms on the station

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Can the useless station engineers make themselfs usefull my setting up the supermatter?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This bullshit experiment is over. I never authorized whatever the fuck is going on. Gas the xenos.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: EVERYONE PANIC THE XENOS LIED TO US>

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Feels Goodman. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
